author: cnbc.com
title: Identiv Sets Fourth Quarter and Fiscal Year 2017 Earnings Call for Thursday, March 8 at 5 PM ET, and Confirms Presentation at 30th Annual ROTH Capital Conference for March 13
text:
FREMONT, Calif., March 01, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Identiv, Inc. (NASDAQ:INVE), a global provider of physical security and secure identification solutions, today announced the Company will hold a conference call on Thursday, March 8, 2018 to discuss its results for its Fourth Quarter and Fiscal Year 2017. The Company also announced it will be presenting at ROTH Capital’s 30th Annual Investor Conference on Tuesday, March 13.
Q4 and FY 2017 Earnings Conference Call
Identiv will hold a conference call on Thursday, March 8, 2018 at 5:00 PM ET (2:00 PM PT) to discuss its results for the fourth quarter and fiscal year ended December 31, 2017. Financial results will be issued in a press release prior to the call. Identiv management will host the call, followed by a question and answer session.
Date: Thursday, March 8, 2018
Time: 5:00 PM ET (2:00 PM PT)
Toll-Free Number: +1-800-289-0438
International Number: +1-323-794-2423
Conference ID: 6863560
Please call the conference telephone number 5 - 10 minutes prior to the start time. An operator will register your name and organization. If you have any difficulty connecting with the conference call, please contact Liolios Group at +1-949-574-3860. The conference call will be broadcast simultaneously and available for replay here . The replay of the call will be available after 8:00 PM ET on the same day through April 8, 2018 under +1-844-512-2921 (Toll-Free Replay Number) and +1-412-317-6671 (International Replay Number) with Replay ID: 6863560.
30th Annual ROTH Capital Conference
Identiv will be presenting at the 30th Annual ROTH Capital Conference , being held March 11-14, 2018 at The Ritz Carlton in Dana Point, CA. Identiv’s presentation will take place on Tuesday, March 13, 2018 at 7:30 PM ET (4:30 PM PT).
Speakers: Steven Humphreys, Identiv CEO
Date/Time: Tuesday, March 13, 2018 // 7:30 PM ET (4:30 PM PT)
Location: The Ritz Carlton in Dana Point, CA
An audio webcast of Identiv’s presentation will be accessible at identiv.com/investors and under this link: http://wsw.com/webcast/roth32/inve/ . The replay will be available for 90 days following the event. In addition to the presentation, Identiv will participate in one-on-one meetings at the conference.
About Identiv
Identiv, Inc. is a global provider of physical security and secure identification. Identiv’s products, software, systems, and services address the markets for physical and logical access control, video analytics and a wide range of RFID-enabled applications. Customers in the government, enterprise, consumer, education, healthcare, banking, retail, and transportation sectors rely on Identiv’s access and identification solutions. Identiv's mission is to secure the connected physical world: from perimeter to desktop access, and from the world of physical things to the Internet of Everything. Identiv is a publicly traded company and its common stock is listed on the NASDAQ Capital Market in the U.S. under the symbol “INVE.” For more information, visit identiv.com .
Investor Relations Contact:
Matt Glover or Najim Mostamand, CFA
Liolios Group, Inc.
IR@identiv.com
